content:encoded:
Topics: Dating, Anger, Borderline, Vacillators
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Jacqui Mack-Harris, Dr. Alice Benton

Caller Questions:

  1. I’m dating a man who gets angry easily; do I continue dating him if I can’t trust him? 
  2. After 40yrs, how do I press on with my wife’s borderline personality disorder? 

Suggested Resources:
Is This The One
How We Love
Understanding and Loving a Person with Borderline Personality Disorder
